title: Dodge Challenger SRT Demon 170
description: The final and most powerful gasoline-powered Challenger. A street-legal drag monster built to dominate the quarter-mile with over 1000 horsepower on E85 fuel.

title: Dodge Charger SRT Hellcat Widebody
description: The quintessential four-door muscle car, packing supercharged Hellcat power into a practical sedan with an aggressive widebody stance.

title: Dodge Durango SRT Hellcat
description: Defying expectations by placing a supercharged Hellcat engine into a three-row SUV, making it the world's most powerful family hauler.

title: Dodge Viper GTS
description: An uncompromising American supercar icon, famous for its massive naturally-aspirated V10 engine and raw, unfiltered driving experience.

title: Dodge Hornet R/T
description: Dodge's entry into the compact performance SUV segment, featuring a plug-in hybrid powertrain and a 'PowerShot' feature for an electric boost on demand.

title: Dodge Charger Daytona (General Lee)
description: An iconic piece of automotive and pop culture history, famous as the 'General Lee' from 'The Dukes of Hazzard'. A rare homologation special built for NASCAR.

title: Dodge Challenger R/T Scat Pack
description: Widely considered the best performance value in the muscle car world, offering a powerful 6.4L HEMI V8 and pure, naturally-aspirated thrills.

title: Dodge Ram 1500 TRX
description: The apex predator of performance trucks, purpose-built for high-speed off-roading with a supercharged Hellcat engine and extreme suspension.

title: Dodge Magnum SRT8
description: A unique and now-classic muscle wagon, combining the practicality of a station wagon with the raw power of a 6.1L HEMI V8 engine.

title: Dodge Neon SRT-4
description: A legendary sport compact 'giant killer' from the 2000s tuner era, known for its explosive turbocharged power in a lightweight, unassuming package.
